REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1741 reute r f BC-VERNITRON-<VRN>-SETS 04-02 0045

TEXT.TITLE: VERNITRON <VRN> SETS SHAREHOLDER VOTE ON MERGER
TEXT.BODY: Vernitron Corp said it expects to hold a special meeting in June for a vote on its proposed merger into SB Holding Corp, which acquired 54.7 pct of Vernitron in a tender offer last November. Reuter
